definitions.definition: The place where sanctified souls are believed to live after death.
definitions.example: Living in paradise comes with a price.

definitions.definition: (Abrahamic religions) A garden where Adam and Eve first lived after being created.
A very pleasant place; a place full of lush vegetation.
definitions.example: an island paradise in the Caribbean; a shoppers’ paradise

definitions.definition: An open space within a monastery or adjoining a church, such as the space within a cloister, the open court before a basilica, etc.
The upper gallery in a theatre.
To affect or exalt with visions of happiness.
